snippet.title: Worlds.com - Alone
snippet.description:
Completely and utterly. 




Hello everyone, Lora here. I guess I should explain a little about Worlds,in case you didn't know about it, yeah? 

Worlds.com is a 3D chat room, the precursor to other programs like Second Life and such. It was created in 1995, and has remain relatively untouched for at least a decade and a half, leaving behind official creations, and user creations. These creations are what I seek to explore, because whether it's intended or not, the empty rooms and outdated graphics are incredibly creepy.

Songs used:
LCDDEM - bgm005
LCDDEM - bgm010
骨架的 - computer
Silent Hill 3 - Purgatory Cries
Silent Hill 3 - All Screwed Up
